text: Ahmet Ege Gürleyen (born 26 April 1999) is a German-Turkish professional footballer who plays as a defender for SV Wehen Wiesbaden on loan from Mainz 05. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Association football defenders Category:German footballers Category:Footballers from Berlin Category:Germany youth international footballers Category:Turkish footballers Category:Turkey youth international footballers Category:German people of Turkish descent Category:1. FSV Mainz 05 II players Category:1. FSV Mainz 05 players Category:SV Wehen Wiesbaden players Category:Bundesliga players Category:Regionalliga players
title: Ahmet Gürleyen
